message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. What do you say?
You wanted to start fair, but I'm not that generous. I'll give you 20, and take the rest.
Okay, I see your point about fairness. Let's try 40/60 this time.  It's still a good deal for both of us, considering the inflation!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the lion's share.
Alright, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 25/75.  I'm not happy about it, but I don't want to risk getting nothing at all.
You're getting really desperate, and I'm getting greedy. I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm taking most of the pie.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take a big loss, but I'm not letting you take everything. 15/85 is my final offer.
